language.description: Language selected by user when creating template

offset.description: Offset, indicating the starting point for the query; offset >= 0, default is 0

sort_key.description: Field used for sorting, optional. Values: name, create_time

sort_dir.description: Sort type, optional. asc for ascending, desc for descending

tools.name: CreatePipelineByTemplate
tools.description: Based on template quickly create pipeline and pipeline tasks

flow.description: 编排flow详情,描述流水线内各阶段任务的串并行关系。map类型数据,key为阶段名字,默认第一阶段initial,最后阶段为final,其余名字以'state_数字'标识。value为该阶段内任务(以'Task_数字'标识)以及后续阶段的标识。本字段为描述流水线基础编排数据之一,建议可通过流水线真实界面基于模板创建接口中获取

states.description: 编排State详情,map类型数据。本字段为描述流水线基础编排数据之一,建议可通过流水线真实界面基于模板创建接口中获取

display_name.description: 任务在流水线页面展示名字

dsl_method.description: 流水线可挂载任务类型

execution_mode.description: 控制阶段下任务的串并行(type是task的execution_mode值为null,type是stage的execution_mode可选parallel(并行)或者serial(串行))

hook_flag.description: 是否开启触发执行流水线功能

offset.description: Offset,表示从此偏移量开始查询,offset大于等于0

end_date.description: End date, the interval between the start date and the end date does not exceed one month, and the query includes the end date

start_date.description: Start date, the interval between the start date and the end date does not exceed one month, and the query includes the start date

build_params.description: 启动流水线时的构建参数

value.description: 构建参数值,最大长度为8192

tools.name: ListPipelines
tools.description: Get pipeline list/Get project pipeline execution status

tools.name: ShowPipleineStatus
tools.description: Get pipeline status, stage and task information

build_id.description: To get the status of the execution ID

pipeline_id.description: To get the status of the pipeline ID

tools.name: BatchShowPipelinesStatus
tools.description: Batch get pipeline status and stage information

pipeline_ids.description: To get the status of the pipeline ID, separated by commas

pipeline_name.description: 流水线名字。参数存在,则进行模糊匹配

project_ids.description: devCloud项目ids。该参数存在,则获取对应项目下的流水线列表,逗号分隔,id个数取值[0,10];如果不存在,则获取调用方所属租户的流水线列表

creator_ids.description: 创建人id。该参数存在,逗号分隔,id个数取值[0,10]

executor_ids.description: 执行人id。该参数存在,逗号分隔,id个数取值[0,10];

outcome.description: 流水线结果,标记流水线。error、success、aborted

sort_dir.description: 排序类型。asc按排序字段升序,desc按排序字段降序

git_url.description: codehub搜索链接:git@codehub.XXX.git;gitee搜索链接:git@gitee.com.XXX.git;github搜索链接:git@github.com.XXX.git等

offset.description: 偏移量。表示从此偏移量开始查询,offset大于等于0,默认取值为0

limit.description: 每次查询的条目数量。取值[10-50],默认取值为10

tools.name: ListTemplates
tools.description: Query template list, supports paging query, supports template name fuzzy query

asc.description: Whether to sort in ascending order

name.description: Template name, matching rule is fuzzy matching

offset.description: Offset, indicating the starting point for the query; offset >= 0

is_build_in.description: Whether it is a built-in template

tools.name: ShowPipelineRunDetail
tools.description: Get pipeline status/Get pipeline execution details
